channel.title: pseudo-static entry node?
channel.description: So my entry node doesn't seem to change in the Whonix Gateway, even after I reboot the VM. I'm not sure how long exactly i retain a certain entry node, maybe it switches after a while I'm not sure, but I'm wondering, is this is normal? Do you guys have the same entry node on each circuit even though you've rebooted? Thanks!

item.title: pseudo-static entry node?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

please regard this: https://www.torproject.org/docs/faq.html.en#EntryGuards

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: pseudo-static entry node?
item.dc:creator: wuaelsiento
item.description:
So my entry node doesn’t seem to change in the Whonix Gateway, even after I reboot the VM. I’m not sure how long exactly i retain a certain entry node, maybe it switches after a while I’m not sure, but I’m wondering, is this is normal? Do you guys have the same entry node on each circuit even though you’ve rebooted? Thanks!
